Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Tawe lekha butswa, ahambi hano baletsa okhumanya
Mana Khandi tawe lekha butswa, ahambi hano baletsa okhumanya
Ne ni khubaloonga tsimbia tsibili (eshisatsa neshikhasi)
Ne nikhukhola okhukona khwenyu okhuba okhuwuluukha
Ne	nikhukhola	eshitere	okhuba shiokhukhalabanila obulamu
Ne nikhumbakha hekulu wenyu amakulu saba aka amani
Ne nikhukasia itaa yobulafu nende obubafu
Ne nikhwishia amatsi karulanga bwangu okhurula mumaleesi
kachila khurusie khuko imele nende emimela
Inyanga yolwika lulikhupwa, nanyu muliitsa mumikanda
Ne likulu liliikulwa liaba shinga emiliango
Ne tsingulu tsilisiulwa tsiaba shinga amaweruweru
Shibalipilamwo shiosi shiosi eshinyifu nohomba eshinywebwa tawe
Toto bo Shibasubilanga mbu khuliba nende inyanga yemikabo tawe
Kho mupile! Shikhubameta shiosi shiosi tawe halali eshinyasio
Omurungo ukhurula Khu Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi Omurungo kuyela
Nyasaye Omulesi welikulu nende eshialo nende biosi bilimwo Omunji wetsimbabaasi shibalilomaloma imbeli wuwe tawe
Inyanga ya Roho (Jibreel) alisinjila nende Abamalaika khulunyaali. Shalilomaloma yesiyesi tawe okhuyiniakhwo ulia ulifuchililwa nende Nyasaye wetsimbabaasi, ne aliboola obulaamba bwonyene
Eyo niyo inyanga yatoto. Ne owenya atile injila akalushile Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi
Toto efwe khubekanyisilia eshinyasio shili ahambi okhuula. Inyanga ya Omundu alilola kayakhola omwene. Ne Omukhayi aliboola mbu: “manyanga ndakhabeele liloba!”
Nditsuba Khubamalaika bakhunyulanga (emioyo cha bakhayi) nende amaani
Nende balia bashilananga tsimbilo (nende emioyo chiabasuubili okhuyila mwikulu)
Nende balia bakaasinjia amakhuwa. (emioyo emibii nichinyoola eshinyasio, ne emilayi nichisangaasibwa)
Inyanga yolwika lulikhupwa lweyimbeli (lulirenjia buli eshindu)
Kho toto okhulamusibwa okho ni oluyoka lulala lwonyene
hawo na hawo buli eshiloonje shiliba mushikuri eshiya
Olwa Nyasaye wuwe yamulanga mulitwoma lio luyali lia T’uwaa
Tsia ewa Firauni, toto ye yaburirira
Ekhwimilile khu Nyasaye wo onyoole okhumuria
Khandi nakalukha inyuma, nakhola eshinani. (Okhukania Abandu balafuchilila Musa tawe)
Kho Omulonji namutila namuhelesia eshinyasio khukayaboola kokhumalilikha (nesie Nyasaye wenyue omukhongo) nende kayaranjilila (Abulaho Nyasaye wundi owulali esie)
toto esho neshimanyisio khubalia baria Nyasaye
Koo! Nobutinyu okhuloonga enywe nohomba likulu? Ye niye waliumbakha
Ne nara eshilima mushilo shiayio, ne nayiniamwo eshitere
Ne ulia waria okhwema imbeli Wa Nyasaye wuwe , nakaania omwoyo kukwe obwikombi
Toto oyo Mwikulu nishiliba eshimenyo shishie
Obumalilishi bweyinyanga eyo buli khu Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi
Toto ewe oli butswa Omwikanyilisi khu ulia owaria inyanga eyo
Olwa baliyilola inyanga eyo, balikaala mbu shibamenya khwo (khushialo) tawe halali ingolobe ndala nohomba eshitere shiayo
Ne nishina shikhumanyia ye awundi anyala ukhwitwenula
Ne	ulia wilola mbu kamubulilamwo oluchendo
Omundu	yasikha!	Nishina shimukholanga aba omukhayi
okhurulana nende indonyande ya amaatsi kolwibulo, yamuloonga mana namubalilila
Khulwo obukhala bwenyu nende ebiruche bienyu
Inyanga yo Omundu alimwilukha Omusiani wabu
Buli shiamulala aliba nende akeke kamuyela
Ne obweni bundi inyanga eyo buliba nende olufu
Ne olwe tsingamia tsili inda tsililekhwa
Ne omukhana wayabilwa omulamu Olwa alireebwa
toto Kano ni amakhuwa komurumwa woluyali
Ne owashienywe uno Shali Omulalu tawe
Ne toto bwene yamulola (jibreel) netsimoni tsie mubulafu
Naye Shali Omwimani khumakhuwa kefisa tawe
Nohomba kano shikali amakhuwa ka Shetani washienwa tawe
Ne Ikurani ino ni eshitsulisio butswa khubiloonje biosi
Ne enywe shimulenya tawe halali okhuula yeenye Nyasaye Omulesi webiloonje biosi
Buli Omundu alimanya shayakhola imbeli nende mukhumalilikha
Ewe Omundu! Ni shina shiakhukatia khu Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi Woluyali
Shikali kario tawe! halali enywe muyingananga mbu inyanga yomurungo shilibaho tawe
Ne toto Abakholi betsimbi baliba mumulilo
Ne ni shina shilakhumanyia inyanga yomurungo eyo
Khandi ni shina shilakhumanyia inyanga yomurungo eyo
Inyanga yo Omundu alikhaywa okhokhoonya owundi shiosi shiosi, ne inyanga eyo obunyali bwoosi buliba bwa Nyasaye yenyene
Balia abeene nibeepimila	khubandu benyanga betsusilibwe
Nabo nibapimila Abandu khushipimo nahomba khuratili bakatia
Inyanga yabandu baliema imbeli wa Omulesi webilonje biosi
Shikali kario tawe! (Shinga olwa mukholanga) toto bwene ebikhole bia aboononi bili mushitabu shilangwa mbu Sijjin
Eshinyasio eshikhongo inyanya eyo shiliba khubakhayi
Ne shakhayanga okhusuubila inyanga eyo okhuyiniakhwo ulia wabura eshichelo omukholi wetsimbi
Nasoomelwa ebimanyisio biefu naboola mbu: “etso ni tsingano etsia bakhale !”
Shikali kario tawe! habula emioyo chiabu chakhupa tsindebelende okhurulana khu kalia kabakholanga
Shikali kario tawe! Toto bwene abo inyaga eyo balikalilwa okhunyoola tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wabu Omulesi
Shikali kario tawe! (Shinga lwa mukholanga)! toto bwene ebikhole bia abamalayi bili mushitabu shilangwa mbu I’liyyin
Toto bwene abakholi abamalayi baliba mubwokholo
Olibamanyila khukhumesamesa khwo obweni bwabu ukhurulana khu obwokholo
Mukhumalikha khwabio (ebinywebwa ebo) biwunya obulayi shinga imisk. Ne khulwa okhunyoola kano bashilane balia abenya okhushilana
Toto bwene Abakholi betsimbi batsekhanga abasuubili
Ne ni bakalukha mubandu babu bakalukha nibasangaalile
Ne nibabalola baboola mbu: “toto bano nibo bakora.”
Nabo abo shibarumwa okhuba abalindi babu tawe
Olwa lelo Abasuubila nibo bastsekha Abakhayi
Ne olwa liliwulila Nyasaye walio, shingala lialachilwa okhumuwulila
Mana liarusia biosi bilimwo liaba likhaya
Ne olwa liliwulila Nyasaye walio, shingala lialachilwa okhumuwulila
Ewe Omundu! Toto ewe oleeminjia eshinani shishio okhulolana nende Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi, mana Olimunyoola
Ne ulia owulihebwa eshitabu shishie no mukhono kukwe omulunji
Kho oyo okhubalwa khukhwe khuliba okhwangu
Ne alikalushila Abandu bebe nali nomwikhoyo
Ne ulia ulihelesibwa eshitabu shishie namukongo wuwe
Toto ye yali mubandu be nali nomwikhoyo
Toto ye yaparanga mbu shalikalukha khandi tawe
Kali mbu, toto bwene Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi yamulolanga
Ne nditsuba khubwakhanyu bweliuba nilitsia okhukwa
Toto bwene mwitsa okhunina eshisia khu khushisia
Halali balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi, abo baliba nende umurungo kulawa tawe
Nabo nibo abaloli khu kalia kabakholelanga Abasuubili
Nabo shibalolakhwo khubo obubii bwosi bwosi tawe habula okhusuubila khwabu khu Nyasaye Owamani Owa oluyali
Uli nende obwami bwo mwikulu nende khushialo ne Nyasaye nomuloli wabuli eshindu
Toto balia bakhoba Abasuubili Abasatsa nende Abasuubili Abakhasi mana nibalekanila , balinyoola ishinyasio shiomulilo ne balinyoola eshinyasio eshiokhusambwa
Toto bwene balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi balinyoola emikunda chiburangamwo imialo, ne okho nikho okhubura okhukhongo
Toto bwene eshinyasio shia Nyasaye wuwo neshilulu
Toto ye aranjilisinjia	khandi niye ukalusinjia
Koo! Wawulilakhwo olukano lwabalwani be liyie
Ne nishina eshikhumanyia mbu nishina esho shitsanga eshilo
Ne Omundu ahenge yalongwa okhurulana nende shina
Yalongwa	okhurulana	khu	matsi karulanga nikamitsikha
Toto bwene Nyasaye ali nende obunyali bwokhumukalusia
Inyanga ya kalia kefisa kalirebwa habulafu
Abwene aho shaliba nende amani nohomba Omuhabini tawe
Na siesi ndamanya obututi bwabu po
Mana bahelesie ebise abakhayi- kaala kaala
Witsoomie elira lia Nyasaye wuwo Owoluyali
halali Nyasaye nachama, toto ye amanyile kali habulafu nende kefisile
Mana itsulisia, nikali mbu okhwitsulisia khukhoonya
Ne yetsa okhwira ehale nayo omukori
Mana niyetsulila elira lia Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi mana nalaama
Halali enywe mwayanza muno obulamu bwo khushialo
Ne obulamu bwo mwikulu nobulayi ne nibwakhatsotso. (obulaliwa tawe)
Toto kano kali mubitabo bie imbeli
Koo! Kakhwitsilakhwo amacheni kamasila kalifundesia Abandu
Si shikhomesia nohomba sishimala inzala tawe
Inyanga eyo obweni bundi buliba nibunula
Kho itsulisia! Katoto ewe oli Omwitsulisia
kho Nyasaye alimuhelesia eshinyasio eshikhongo muno
Nende khu bibili bibili nende khushilala shilala
Kho! Mu kano khulolokhanamwo eshitsubo khu muchesi
Shiwalolakhwo shinga Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi yakhola Abandu ba A’di
Abandu ba	Iram, abali nendi tsinzu tsindambi
Aba Nyasaye alalongakhwo shinga bo khushialo tawe
Nende Thsamudi abakasinjia tsinzu mutsingulu mumatwoma
Mana Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi yabakhupa eshiboko shieshinyasio
Toto Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi abahenganga mukhwibwondela
Ne Omundu Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi namutema namuhelesia emiandu nende obwokholo amalanga aboola mbu Nyasaye wanje yambelesia oluyali
Ne namutema mana amuleemie omukabo kwe aboola mbu: “Nyasaye wanje yasukuna!”
Shikali kario tawe! Halali enywe shimuhenganga Abafwilwa neshisa tawe
Ne mulitsanga emiandu chiabafwilwa okhulia khwatoto
Ne mwayanza emiandu obuyanzi obuunji muno
Shikali kario tawe! olwe eshialo shilifunakwa ebitonye ebitonye
Ne aliitsa Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi nende Abamalaika olunyali olunyali
Ne omulilo kwa Jahannamu kulireerwa inyanga eyo, omundu inyanga eyo alitsulila , halali okhwitsulila okho shikhulimukhoonya shiosi shiosi tawe
Aliboola mbu: “manyanga ndakharanjisiliyie ebikhole ebilayi mubulamu bwanje!”
Mana inyanga eyo abulaho yesi yesi ulihelesia eshinyasio shinga eshinyasio shisie
Nohomba shaliboya yesiyesi shinga okhuboya khukhwe tawe
Kalukha khu Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi noli omulekhule yesi nali omulekhule nawe
Kho injila halala nende Abasumba banje
Ne ewe oli omwibule welitokho lino
Aparanga mbu abulaho omundu yesi yesi umunyala
Kho aparanga mbu abulaho yesiyesi umulolanga
Ne shiyeruma khunjila yebisikirasio yeshisia tawe
Ne nishina shikhwechesia okhumanya injila yebisikirasio yeshisia
Mana abe mubalia basuubila nibatinyisania okhwifwila ne nibaboolelana okhulolanila eshisa
Ne balia bakhaya ebimanyiso biefu, abo nibo Abandu bomukhono mukhasi
Nende	khu mwoyo nende ulia wakuleng’aasia
Mana nakumanyisia injila yamabii nende yamalayi. 15. Naye sharitsanga karulilaho tawe
toto bwene yamala okhubura ulwa wakutswenula
Ne toto bwene yamala okhusikha ulia wakulekhula
babu Tsamudi bayingasia (omurumwa wabu) khulwo okhubeela obufuru bwabu
aho Omurumwa wa Nyasaye nababoolela mbu ; ingamia ino ni ya Nyasaye, muyileshe inywe amatsi kayio ne mulayira tawe
Mana bamala bamuyingasia nibaiyira, khulwako Nyasaye wabu nabasishia khulwo khubeela tsimbi tsiabu nabamala boosi
Ne ulia urusia mana arie Omuloonji
Ne ulia ukhola obwimani, mana abule oluchendo na bashie
Ne omwandu kukwe kulimukhonya shina olwa aliba nasikhanga
Toto bwene kali khu efwe okhwechesia obulunjifu
Ne toto bwene kali khu efwe ka mutsuli (akhera) nende kokhuranjilila
Shali kwinjilamwo halali ulia Omubii muno
Ne ulia waria Nyasaye alireebwa ehale ninakwo
ulia Urusinjia omwandu kukwe khulwo khwitswenula
Ne shikali mbu aliho yesi yesi wamukholela amalayi lano khamurunje
Halali nokhukhaaba obulekhule bwa Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi Owoluyali
Nyasaye wuwo shiyakhulekha tawe, nohomba shiyakhusinyishila tawe
Ne imbeli itsanga ilaba indayi okhushila ebise biaranjilila
Ne Nyasaye wuwo omulesi alakhuwa okhula ochame

Ne obwokholo bwa Nyasaye wuwo omulesi obuboole

Toto halala nende obusiro khuli nende obwangu
Ne khu Nyasaye wuwo omulesi niye wokhalabanile
khubwatoto khwaloonga Omundu okhuloonga okhulayi muno

Kho Nyasaye Shali Omubusia Umalayo okhushila Ababusia boosi
Soma mulira lia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi owaloonga
Soma! Ne Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi ni Omuhani Okhushila boosi
yechesia Omundu kalia akalali namanyile tawe
Shikali kario tawe! Toto Omundu abetsanga omufuru
Toto khu Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi niho amakalushilo
Omulutsi ye nayingananga ne nakalukha inyuma
Tawe	Nalalekha	tawe, khulamukhwesulula khuliboyo lieliswi
Ne nishiina shilakhumanyia mbu nishina eshilo shioluyali
Eshilo shioluyali ni shiobukhala muno okhushila emiesi iyelefu
Abamalaika bekhanga nende Roho mushilo esho khumunwa kwa Nyasaye wabu Omulesi buli mwikhuwa
Shibali Abakhayi mubandu beshitabu nende Abatsokaasi bokhulekha akabali ninako okhuula kaboolele amenoosio
Mukari mwatsio khulimwo nende amahandiko kakololokha
Ne shibakabukhana balia bahebwa eshitabu halali nibakhamala okhuulilwa nende amenoosio

Nabo shibalomesibwa shiosi shiosi tawe halali okhulaama Nyasaye khulwa okhumutswenulila idini, Abandu abalunjifu, ne balumilile ukhulaama iswala, ne barusie izaka- eshihanwa. Ne eyo niyo idini yamemelo
Toto balia bakhaya mu bandu beshitabu nende mubatsokaasi balinjila mumulilo kwa jahannamu, bamenyemwo tsinyanga tsiosi, ebo nibo ebiloonje ebibii muno
Toto balia abasuubila mana nibakhola amalayi, ebo nibo ebilonje ebilayi mubandu
Omurungo kwabu ewa Nyasaye wabu Omulesi ni emikunda chilaliwa, chiburangamwo emialo hakari wachio. Ako nikhu ulia oritsanga Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi
Ne olwa liloba liliyinia emisiko chialio

Enywe muli nende idini yenyu, nasi endi nende idini yanje.”
Olwa obuhabini bwa Nyasaye nende obwikuli buliitsa
Ne nolola Abandu nibenjila mudini ya Nyasaye mumikanda
Awo ofumie oluyali lwa Nyasaye wuwo, ne omusabe eshileshelo, toto bwene niye Omulesheli muno
Chiasikha emikhono chibili chiaa Abu Lahab, mana nasikha
Omwandu kukwe shikulimukhoonya tawe nohomba ebiayakhalabanila
Boola mbu: “ye ni Nyasaye mulala yenyene.”
Ne abulaho ufwanana ninaye kata mulala
Boola : “ndilinda khu Nyasaye Omulesi owa mabwibwi,”
